column4: Could some one tell me how to prevent the logging (on & off)  message showing in my IRC client
Which irc client are you using?
sorry, I've not used that, I'm afraid I can't help, I'm sure somebody will be able to help from the channel though
I use irssi which is a console based one, I would suggest you try xchat, thats pretty good and easy to use, similar to Mirc
